traits.name: Insatiable Greed
entries: The eater of hope can sense the presence of gold within 1,000 feet of itself. It can determine which location has the greatest amount of gold and can sense the direction to that site. If the gold is being moved, it knows the direction of the movement. It can't locate gold if any thickness of clay or lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between it and the gold.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The eater of hope has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The eater of hope makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Breath of Hopelessness {@recharge 5}
entries: The eater of hope exhales a miasma of Underworld winds in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 26 (4d12 damage) necrotic damage and is cursed for 1 minute. While cursed in this way, the target takes an extra 6 (1d12 damage) necrotic damage whenever the eater of hope hits it with an attack. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't cursed.
